Description: Reed kohl-tube: formed of a single reed, this kohl tube bears an enigmatic inscription referring to black eye paint.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: E. A. Wallis Budge, 'The Mummy: a Handbook of Egyptian Funerary Archaeology' 2nd ed. (Cambridge 1925), p. 259; H. R. Hall, ‘Objects of Tutankhamun in the British Museum’ in ‘ Journal of Egyptian Archaeology’ 14 (London, 1928), p. 74, pl. 9: 3.
Bibliographic references: Museum of Fine Arts Boston 1982 / Egypt's Golden Age: The Art of Living in the New Kingdom 1558-1085 BC (274)
